eng_transcription: Ariyâramna : xshyathiya : vazraka : xshâyath iya : xshâyathiyânâm : xshâyathiya : Pârsâ : Cishpaish : xshâyathiyahyâ : puça : Haxâmanishah : yâ : napâ : thâtiy : Ariyâramna : xshâyathiya
english: Ariaramnes, the Great King, King of Kings, King in Persia, son of Teispes the King, grandson of Achaemenes.

eng_transcription: adam : Dârayavaush : xshâyathiya : vazraka : xshâyatha : xshâyathiy ânâm : xshâyathiya : Pârsaiy : xshâyathiya : dahyûnâm : Visht âspahyâ : puça : Arshâmahyâ napâ : Haxâmanishiya : thâtiy
english: I am Darius the Great King, King of Kings, King in Persia, King of countries, son of Hystaspes, grandson of Arsames, an Achaemenian.
